name: centilitre
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a unit of measurement of liquid equal to 0.01 of a litre
Examples
The scale on this measuring jug shows millilitres rather than centilitres.If you want to convert litres to centilitres, you multiply by 100.The insulin is supplied from the manufacturer in 10-centilitre bottles.The abbreviation 'cl' stands for centilitres.Why doesn't the recipe just say 2 litres, instead of 200 centilitres?
